item.title: Export PDF
item.description: LATEX_HEADER 1 2 3 4 5 6 #+LATEX_HEADER: documentclass{article} #+LATEX_CLASS_OPTIONS: [a4paper] #+LATEX_HEADER: usepackage{xeCJK} #+LATEX_HEADER: usepackage{minted} #+LATEX_HEADER: usepackage[margin=2cm]{geometry} #+LATEX_HEADER: setminted{fontsize=small,baselinestretch=1} 防止页面溢出 1 2 3 #+ATTR_LATEX: :environment longtable :align l|lp{3cm}r|l | ..... | ..... | | ..... | ..... |
